Name: Buckwheat Noodles
Description: A bag of coarse, earthy-flavored noodles.

DescriptionLocalization.es: Una bolsa de fideos gruesos, con sabor a tierra.
DescriptionLocalization.de: Eine Tüte mit groben, erdigen Nudeln.
DescriptionLocalization.fr: Un sac de nouilles grossières, à saveur terreuse.
DescriptionLocalization.ja: 粗めに切られた素朴な風味の麺
DescriptionLocalization.pt: Uma bolsa de trigo grosso, com sabor terroso.
DescriptionLocalization.ru: Мешок с грубой лапшой, имеющей земляной привкус.
DescriptionLocalization.tr: Bir poşet kalın ve tadı topraksı noodle.
